adjectives.description: suent (comparative more suent, superlative most suent)

entries.meaning: Uniformly or evenly distributed or spread; even; smooth.
examples: Bankruptcy and repudiation are the springboards from which much of our civilization vaults and turns its sommersets. ...Yet the Middlesex Cattle Show goes off here with Ã©clat annually, as if all the joints of the agricultural machine were suent.
